job.title: Volunteer: Web Developer with WordPress Knowledge
job.description: Human Health Project HHP is a global nonprofit organization dedicated to helping individuals increase their health knowledge through the sharing of health information HHP collects analyzes and shares health information to empower and inform individuals to achieve better health outcomes Our patientcentered approach enables patients and caregivers to choose treatments based on evidencebased clinical data as well as the cumulative knowledge of the HHP communitybrbrFor more Information about HHP please visit our website https wwwhumanhealthprojectorgbrbrHuman Health Project HHP is a global nonprofit organization dedicated to helping individuals increase their health knowledge through the sharing of health information HHP collects analyzes and shares health information to empower and inform individuals to achieve better health outcomes Our patientcentered approach enables patients and caregivers to choose treatments based on evidencebased clinical data as well as the cumulative knowledge of the HHP community We envision a world where all people have the information skills and opportunities to lead healthy livesbrbrFor more Information about HHP please visit our website https wwwhumanhealthprojectorgbrbrInformation on HHP IMPACT Program https tinyurlcom HHPUSIMPACTbrbrstronguJob OverviewbrbrustrongHHP is looking for a web developer who can update websites using WordPress and who can input codes for integration with some of our tools as neededbrbrstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli Experience working with WordPresslili HTML CSS JavaScript skills requiredlili Strong internet connectionlili Good Englishlili Webmasterlili Content ManagementbrliulThis is a volunteer opportunity provided by VolunteerMatch in partnership with LinkedIn for Good
